text: vah raat ko din mein pravisht karata hai aur din ko raat mein pravisht karata hain. usane soory aur chandrama ko kaam mein laga rakha hai. pratyek ek niyat samay pooree karane ke lie chal raha hai. vahee allaah tumhaara rab hai. usee kee baadashaahee hai. usase hatakar jinako tum pukaarate ho ve ek tinake ke bhee maalik nahin
